languages.text: "Всему свое время, {name}". {n}Маражай проворачивает раскаленное лезвие в пальцах и улыбается.{/n}
"All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Всему свое время, {name}". {n}Маражай проворачивает раскаленное лезвие в пальцах и улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

"All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

languages.text: “你会明白的，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋用手指捻着烧红的刀刃，微笑着，开了口。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你会明白的，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋用手指捻着烧红的刀刃，微笑着，开了口。{/n}

languages.text: 「時が来たらな、{name}」{n}マラズハイは、真っ赤に熱くなった刃を指の間で回して微笑んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「時が来たらな、{name}」{n}マラズハイは、真っ赤に熱くなった刃を指の間で回して微笑んだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Todo a su tiempo, {name}». {n}Marazhai sonríe mientras hace girar la cuchilla al rojo vivo entre sus dedos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Todo a su tiempo, {name}». {n}Marazhai sonríe mientras hace girar la cuchilla al rojo vivo entre sus dedos.{/n}

languages.text: « Chaque chose en son temps, {name}. » {n}Le sourire aux lèvres, Marazhai fait tourner la lame chauffée à blanc entre ses doigts.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Chaque chose en son temps, {name}. » {n}Le sourire aux lèvres, Marazhai fait tourner la lame chauffée à blanc entre ses doigts.{/n}

languages.text: "Alles zu seiner Zeit, {name}." {n}Marazhai zwirbelt die glühend heiße Klinge zwischen seinen Fingern und lächelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All in good time, {name}." {n}Marazhai twirls the red-hot blade between his fingers and smiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Alles zu seiner Zeit, {name}." {n}Marazhai zwirbelt die glühend heiße Klinge zwischen seinen Fingern und lächelt.{/n}

languages.text: "Her şeyin bir zamanı var {name}." {n}Marazhai, akkor hâldeki bıçağı parmaklarının arasında döndürerek gülümsüyor.{/n}
